org.osmdroid.bonuspack.routing
Class MapQuestRoadManager

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.bonuspack.routing.RoadManager
      org.osmdroid.bonuspack.routing.MapQuestRoadManager

public class MapQuestRoadManager
extends RoadManager

class to get a route between a start and a destination point, going through a list of waypoints. It uses MapQuest open, public and free API, based on OpenStreetMap data.
Return a "Road" object.

Author:
M.Kergall
See Also:
Road, MapQuest Guidance API
